name: Pineapple Evolution
description:
Pineapple Evolution is a single-screen vertical shooter, created for Curdle Jam 28. The jam's theme was a bit weird: "People In Nature--Environmentally Afflictive Presence--Progressively Lead Evolution", but I decided to try running with it anyways.

Controls

The game can be played with either the keyboard or a gamepad.

  • A Button/'A' Key – Fire
  • B Button/'S' Key – Clean
  • X Button/'D' Key – Toggle Autofire
  • Start Button/Enter Key – Start/Pause
  • Back Button/Escape Key – Back/Quit
